Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using the HEK293 cell line.

Readout description.Result Description: Immunohistochemical staining showed α-syn deposits in the olfactory bulb nuclei.

Biological replicates.Description: Replicate experiments were conducted with HEK293 cells.

Technical replicates.Description: Each experiment was performed on multiple samples.

Basic positive control.Description: Control experiments without α-syn mutations were conducted.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA followed by Tukey's post-hoc test.

Material used.Description: Lysates from HEK293 cells were analyzed.

Readout description.Result Description: Western blot analysis showed reduced α-syn levels in the brainstem nuclei.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was analyzed in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Control experiments with wild-type α-syn expression were conducted.

Basic negative control.Description: Control experiments without α-syn expression were conducted.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA followed by Tukey's post-hoc test.

Material used.Description: Lysates from HEK293 cells were analyzed.

Readout description.Result Description: Mass spectrometry detected elevated α-syn deposits in brain stem nuclei.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was analyzed in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Control experiments with wild-type α-syn expression were conducted.

Basic negative control.Description: Control experiments without α-syn expression were conducted.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA followed by Tukey's post-hoc test.
